articles.description: Samsung Display and LG Display are showing offer new foldable screen technology at this year’s Display Week conference in San Jose, California. They mean fguture foldables could move on from existing single-fold designs.
articles.content:
Samsung and LGs display divisions are showing off new designs
LG Displays 360-degree Foldable OLED.
Image: LG
Future foldables could move on from existing single-fold designs to fold twice, use di… [+2774 chars]
